directions: Whisk oil, lemon juice, mustard, sugar, salt, white pepper, and black pepper together in a bowl until smooth.
Toss lettuce, onion, blueberries, almonds, mandarin oranges, and strawberries together in a large bowl. Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
title: Jenny Allen's Fruit Salad
